Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; part of lotus-palmette and palmette chain in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: surface mostly worn; band of strokes around rim; below, uncertain motif.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by University College London. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1588) (phase 2)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: ucl np 54 (Other Accession Number)
